tags.description: Cobble; Sand at low water. Dispersed site secondary. Sheltered, undeveloped. Large clear upland area. S aspect. Not much view.
tags.name: Owl Island South (BCMT)

tags.description: Protected moderate gradient cobble/pebble beach in protected bay. Undeveloped. Gloomy, damp but spacious. 1 tent site in upland second growth forest. More with brushing. Possible beach camping. Seasonal creek (July+).
tags.name: Mel's Beach / Square Notch Bay (BCMT)

tags.description: Steep beach of pebbles, small cobble, gravel in small cove. Open spacious treed site. Heavy use including by guided commercial groups. Small trail leads across neck of land to boulder beach with W aspect for evening sun.
tags.name: Owl Island North

tags.description: Gravel, shell, mud beach. Good protection from SE, fair from W. Tree deadfall blocks much of beach. Sheltered, undeveloped. Camping in 2 clear areas on small headland facing an islet. Frequently used by commercial groups. Potential sites on nearby islands
tags.name: Fox Group South (BCMT)

tags.description: Firm gravel/cobble beach, some rocks at low tide. Extensive site along old road. Maintained by Namgis First Nation. Adjacent commercial site has more infra, and heavy use by guided groups. Water at creek. Views.
tags.name: Kaikash Creek (BCMT)

tags.description: Pebble/cobble beach sheltered by peninsula. NE cobbles, some boulders at high water. SE mostly sand. Seasonal creek. Whale viewing. Anchorage. Historic hiking trail to Telegraph Cove. Sheltered forest upland camping in 3 locations or on large beach.
tags.name: Blinkhorn Peninsula (BCMT)

tags.description: Low gradient beach of mud, sand with many small boulders at low water. S aspect. Protected. Camp on high bench in trees behind large boulder on beach. Beach floods at Springs. Water at seasonal creek to W of tent sites. Attractive. Aka Sunday Harbour.
tags.name: Crib Island (BCMT)

tags.description: Dispersed site secondary. Minor brushing required in upland forest. Beach camp possible on gravel. Attractive. Trail across isthmus.
tags.name: Hudson Island (BCMT)

tags.description: White shell beach. Steep wooded 'platform' above. Access from main E beach blocked 2019 by blown down trees. May land on W side of rocky point instead. Camp in forest above. One visible tent pad. Potential for about 3 more. Kayak Bill site.
tags.name: Spiller Passage (BCMT)

tags.description: Sand, rock beach. Some boulders. Dispersed site secondary. Camp on rough grass. Likely wet at Springs.
tags.name: Dusky Cove north (BCMT)

tags.description: Low gradient mud, mixed rocks beach. Alternative W side bay. Protected from SW. Upland gloomy, damp site with 2 cleared tent pads in salal. W side bay has strip of grassy sand between beach, forest, but might floods at Springs.
tags.name: Sedge Islands (BCMT)

tags.description: Drying cove. Exposed rock ledges for landing. Dispersed site secondary. Some grassy areas or level rock ledges offer shelter from wind. Attractive. View.
tags.name: White Cliff Islets (BCMT)

tags.description: Sheltered sand, pebble beach. Boulders at low water, easy to avoid. Semi-developed. Beach or upland forest sites in rough clearings on W side of bay. One sandy beach site at E end. Pit toilet. Door needs repair 2015. Mostly in shade, so usually damp..
tags.name: Crease Island north (BCMT)

tags.description: Pebble, gravel beach, with cobbles, boulders at sides. Moderate gradient. Protected from N, E, SE. Currents to 3 kn in Swanson Passage. Campsite primary. 5 wooden tent pads in upland forest. Pole shed kitchen shelter. Fire pit. Trail to Rough Islets site.
tags.name: Maggy Point (BCMT)

tags.description: S landing in semi-enclosed cove has mostly boulder shores. E or W on cobble, small rocks. Trails on peninsula through salal to sites. 4 large wooden tent pads. Grassy areas appear damp. Pole kitchen, picnic table, fire pit. Trail to Maggy Point.
tags.name: Rough Islets (BCMT)

tags.description: Sheltered gravel beach with scattered angular rocks at low water. Forested sites at E tip, view of water. Attractive. Orca Lodge in nearby cove on Swanson Is. Short trail offers views in all directions. Site could be removed if not kept clean.
tags.name: Flower Island (BCMT)

tags.description: Sheltered sand, gravel, cobble beach in cove. Strong currents. Semi-developed spacious site in forested upland. Attractive. Whale watching. Aka Mossy Knoll.
tags.name: Leg Cove (BCMT)

tags.description: Moderate gradient cobble beach in sheltered bay, exposed rock shelf at low water. Large area with sheltered tent sites, platforms in forested upland at 3 locations. Attractive, sunny. Views, trails. Day use by commercial groups likely. Creek seasonal.
tags.name: Big Bay Beach Hanson Island (BCMT)

tags.description: Rock/rubble shelf. Signs of a boat run. Vessel traffic, currents and rough water in Blackney Passage. Semi exposed, part developed. 1 platform, 2 sites on rock,1 site in trees along trail around S end of island. Views.
tags.name: Little Hanson Island (BCMT)

tags.description: Shell beach at mid water levels. Rock shelf, muck at very low water. S side of peninsula preferred. Upland semi-developed tent sites on duff in open second growth forest. Additional forest sites approx. 50 -100 m uphill. Large site.
tags.name: Turnour Island BCMT camp

tags.description: Low gradient clam bed of mud at low water. Mixed boulder, cobble, rubble beach of moderate gradient at high water. Evidence of old boat run. Some tent sites might require brushing. Not used much. Hammock opportunities.
tags.name: Pearl Island BCMT site

tags.description: Sand pebble and cobble beach. Dispersed site secondary. Sheltered sites in young forest. May need brushing. Provinial Boat Haven.
tags.name: Crease Island South (BCMT)

tags.description: Sand, gravel beach. Some boulders at low water. May have surge. Currents in Providence Passage. Passage between Cedar, Midsummer Is dries. Large clear area in gloomy forest. Some sites slope. Open to afternoon sun. Good alternative to Owl Is N.
tags.name: Cedar Island (BCMT)

tags.description: Rock/pebble/cobble at mid water levels. Most or all beaches flood at high water, leaving angular bedrock. Boulders present at low water. Potential high water landing beach on S. Attractive small tent sites in open just above shoreline. View, wild flowers.
tags.name: Sophia Islands West (BCMT)

tags.description: Moderate gravel beach, drift logs at high water, canoe run through large cobble at mid water. Mud, sand at low water. Tent pads. Pit toilet. Cookhouse. Food cache. Might be exclusive commercial in future. Water at seasonal creek. Views and viewpoint.
tags.name: Boat Bay (BCMT)

tags.description: Rock/pebble beach at head of prominent bay. Protected from NW. Rocks offshore. Sheltered, undeveloped. Camp in trees or on beach. Views. Occasional use by commercial groups.
tags.name: Growler Cove Northwest (BCMT)

tags.description: Exposed pebble beach. Day Use. Undeveloped. May be developed as campsite in future. View.
tags.name: Bells Rocks South (BCMT)

tags.description: Protected beach at high water, mixed rocks at low water, very low tides impractical. Passage between Leone and Berry Islands dries. Undeveloped level upland sites. Rustic benches. Also possible sites with toilet on Leone Island, opposite, but not checked.
tags.name: Lesser Berry Island (BCMT)

tags.description: Low gradient clam bed with bedrock outcrops. Dispersed site secondary. S side has camping on open headland between S end of Leone I, islets.. Pit toilet reported on NW side - area not checked.
tags.name: Leone Island south (BCMT)

tags.description: Protected pebble beach of moderate gradient. E aspect. Dispersed site secondary. Level upland forest sites.but deadfall makes access awkward. Tent sites could be readily brushed out.
tags.name: Leone Island East (BCMT)

tags.description: Small shell beach or through narrow gap in high rock shelf. Undeveloped. Small sheltered upland site in forest backed by cliff. S aspect. Beach or forest sites. Attractive. Aka Monday Anchorage.
tags.name: Tracey Island (BCMT)
